translations: n．未来主义者：关注未来发展趋势、技术创新和社会变革的人，通常提出预测和设想。
· Futurists predict that technology will continue to advance at an exponential rate.
未来主义者预测，技术将继续以指数级速度发展。

sentences.sentence: Some futurists envision nanotechnology also being used to explore the deep sea in small submarine, or even to launch finger-sized rockets packed with micro miniature instruments.
sentences.translation: 一些未来学家设想纳米技术也可以用于在小型潜水艇里探索深海，甚至可以用来发射装有微型仪器的手指大小的火箭。

sentences.sentence: The world is never short of futurists and forecasters.
sentences.translation: 世界从来不缺乏对未来的预测者、描绘者。

sentences.sentence: Futurists and sci-fi visionaries have always forecasted big screens everywhere.
sentences.translation: 一直以来，在未来主义者和科幻梦想家的描绘中，未来处处皆有大屏幕。
